results.name: Number of aperiodic compositions of n with relatively prime parts. Number of compositions of n with relatively prime parts and relatively prime run-lengths.
link: Robert G. Wilson v, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a = mu * mu * c, where * is Dirichlet convolution and c(n) = 2^(n-1).
example: The a(6) = 24 aperiodic compositions with relatively prime parts are:
